name: Easter Egg Hunt
overview: An action game created by Bruce Jaeger and published in both PowerPlay Magazine 1985/04-05, and in Loadstar #011. Here is a program in honor of Easter which is sure to keep any youngster (or adult) happy. The object of this game is to find the five colored Easter eggs lying hidden in the field. Use the joystick to move a blue and white eye and hunt for the eggs. When found, the eggs drop into the waiting Easter basket. The program keeps track of the time it takes to find the five eggs and remembers the lowest time. Happy Easter and happy hunting!
